changeSet.createView: select t1.id as solicitacaoid, t2.id as solicitacaoitemid, t5.id as volumeid, t3.nome, t3.disciplina, t3.autor, t3.editora, t3.anoedicao, t2.traducaomaterial as transcricao, t5.pagina_inicio as paginainicio, t5.pagina_fim as paginafim, t5.status, t6.nome as responsavel, t1.datachegada as datachegada, t4.data_impressao as dataimpressao, t4.data_revisao as datarevisao, t4.data_envio as dataenvio from solicitacao t1 join solicitacaoitem t2 on t1.id = t2.id_solicitacao join livro t3 on t2.id_material = t3.id join solicitacaovolume t4 on t2.id = t4.id_solicitacaoitem join volume t5 on t4.id_volume = t5.id left join usuario t6 on t5.id_responsavel = t6.id order by t1.datachegada asc

changeSet.author: Walber
changeSet.createView: select t1.id, t3.nome as aluno, (extract( year from now()) - extract(year from t3.nascimento_criacao)) as idade, t3.nascimento_criacao as nascimentocriacao, t1.serie, t1.ensino, t7.nome as responsavel, t12.nome as escola, upper(t1.enderecologradouro || case when t1.endereconumero is null then 'S/N' else ', ' || t1.endereconumero end) as endereco, t15.ddd || t15.numero as telefone, t7.email, t5.nome || ' - ' ||t6.sigla as municipiouf, t1.enderecobairro as bairro, t1.enderecocomplemento as complemento, t1.enderecocep as cep, t9.nome || ' - ' ||t10.sigla as nre, t1.datachegada, t16.data_impressao as dataimpressao, t16.data_revisao as datarevisao, t16.data_envio as dataenvio from solicitacao t1 join solicitacaoitem t2 on t1.id = t2.id_solicitacao join viewpessoa t3 on t1.id_aluno = t3.id join endereco t4 on t3.id = t4.pessoaid join cidade t5 on t1.id_municipio = t5.id join unidadefederativa t6 on t5.unidadefederativaid = t6.id join viewpessoa t7 on t1.id_responsavel = t7.id join endereco t8 on t7.id = t8.pessoaid left join cidade t9 on t1.id_cidadenre = t9.id left join unidadefederativa t10 on t9.unidadefederativaid = t10.id join telefone t11 on t7.id = t11.pessoaid left join viewpessoa t12 on t1.id_escola = t12.id left join pessoacaracteristica t13 on t12.id = t13.pessoa_id left join caracteristica t14 on t13.caracteristica_id = t4.id left join telefone t15 on t15.pessoaid = t12.id join solicitacaovolume t16 on t16.id_solicitacaoitem = t2.id where t4.principal = 'S' and coalesce(t4.id,0) = coalesce(coalesce(t4.id,0),5) order by t3.nome asc
